CustomField.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100, "All Contact Details Captured", "Missing: "&IF(ISBLANK(Phone), "Phone, ","")&" " &IF(ISBLANK(MobilePhone), "Mobile, ","")&" " &IF(ISBLANK(Email), "Email, ","")&" " &IF(ISBLANK(MailingStreet), "Street Address, ","")&" " &IF(ISBLANK(DPID_Primary_Address__c), "DPID, ","")&" " &IF(ISBLANK(Title), "Job Title, ",""))
CustomField.label: Contact Data Quality Description
